Set up and customize your AI settings easily
Specify the maximum number of credits pe: Specify the maximum number of credits permitted for this package. To allow unlimited credits, enter -1
Customize the conversion rate from token: Customize the conversion rate from token to credit for each AI model to control AI usage costs in your system.
For each model, enter the number of cred: For each model, enter the number of credits that will be deducted for each token used.
means 20 token = 1 credits (using this m: means 20 token = 1 credits (using this model will cost double).
If you leave a field blank, the system w: If you leave a field blank, the system will use the default value of 1 credit/token.
You can adjust this rate at any time to: You can adjust this rate at any time to suit your pricing strategy or cost control needs.
